import sys

N, M = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
A = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

A.sort()

max_days = 0
for i in range(len(A)):
    if A[i] > N:
        print(-1)
        sys.exit()
    max_days = max(max_days, N - A[i])
    N -= A[i]

print(max_days)

import sys

N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

A.sort()

if sum(A) > N:
    print(-1)
    sys.exit()

ans = 0
for a in A:
    ans += a
    N -= a

print(N)
